title: Papa's Freezeria

headings.text: How to Make Freezer Sundaes in Papa's Freezeria: Step-by-Step Guide

fullContent: Home› RestaurantPapa's FreezeriaBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenPapa Louie is back, opening a brand new branch! In a very quiet town, he opens a freezeria business to sell delicious sundaes! The place has an open position. You think you're perfect for this job: flexible hours, handsome tips, nice weather, and few customers. Perhaps you could go to the beach after work, huh? But wait, what is that? A cruise ship stops in a town full of thirsty passengers! Suddenly, all of them create a line in front of Papa's Freezeria, ready to sip their milkshakes. Roll up your sleeves; it's going to be a busy day at the freezeria.ControlsUse your mouseHow to Make Freezer Sundaes in Papa's Freezeria: Step-by-Step GuideOrder StationOrder Station is where the journey begins!This is where you take and deliver customers' orders. Carefully record each customer's order on an order ticket.Once you've noted the details, drag the tickets onto the ticket line to store and organize them as needed.When you're ready, click on the Build Station at the bottom to start preparing the orders.Build StationNow, the Build Station (where the magic happens)! Here, you start creating delicious sundaes with various syrups.Begin by filling a cup with ice cream and gathering the necessary ingredients to make a perfect freezer sundae.If you can't remember the order, don't worry! Simply drag the tickets to the side to read them easily.Watch the ice cream meter on the machine closely and try to wait until it's perfectly centered. Then, press the green button.Every sundae needs a mixable item from the machine. Strawberries, blueberries, and caramel come as default options, but you can unlock even more flavors as you progress.You'll also be adding syrups to the sundaes here. Vanilla, chocolate, and other delightful syrups are available on the syrup machine. Press the correct button to pour the right syrup.Mix StationThe third station, it's time to blend everything together!Drag the cup to the blender machine and watch the magic happen.Each customer has different blending preferences, so watch the Blend Meter.Wait until it matches what they ordered on their ticket. Once it's ready, drag the cup onto the Topping Track.Topping StationLastly, the Topping Station is the favorite part for many workers! Here, you add the finishing touches to the Freezer sundaes.Add toppings and extras in the order shown on the ticket.Click and drag the whipped cream bottle above the cup and release it to start pouring.Move your mouse left and right until it stops spraying whipped cream.Next, click and drag the syrup above the cup and release it to start pouring.If the order calls for sprinkles or nuts, click and drag from the sprinkles bin and release above the cup to start pouring sprinkles from the scooper. Try to spread them evenly to make the freezer sundae look lovely.For some orders, you must add a specific amount of cherries or Oreos.Carefully place them evenly to ensure the sundae looks as perfect as it tastes. Enjoy the process and have fun making those sundaes look irresistible!What is Papa's Freezeria?Papa's Freezeria is a flash game where you create freezer sundaes and collect tips based on your careful work.DeveloperFlipline Studios created this game.More Papa's GamesIf you enjoy Papa's games, you can check out Papa's Bakeria and bake delicious pies. Or else try Papa Louie When Pizzas Attack for a platformer challenge. All are free to play without any plugin needed on OnlineGames.io.This article was updated on January 14, 20251 Player2DCookingFlashFreeKidsMouseRestaurantTycoon
